content.question: The publication of the excerpt most likely had which of the following purposes?

choices.label: To increase opposition to the United States annexation of the Philippines
To argue for the expansion of the United States armed and naval forces
To challenge United States policies toward American Indians in the West
To explain how United States citizens could settle islands in the Pacific region

content.answer: To increase opposition to the United States annexation of the Philippines

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
